# Inshort - News Media Organization

## About
Inshort is an independent news publication covering politics, technology, business, and culture in Bangladesh with high editorial standards. We focus on E-E-A-T principles (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness).

## Main Sections
- Homepage: https://inshortbd.com/
- Politics: https://inshortbd.com/category/Politics
- Technology: https://inshortbd.com/category/Tech
- Business: https://inshortbd.com/category/Business
- Culture: https://inshortbd.com/category/Culture
- World: https://inshortbd.com/category/World

## Brand Voice
Neutral, fact-based journalism with expert analysis. We provide clear, direct answers to complex questions.

## Contact
- Email: Inshortbd007@gmail.com
- Website: https://inshortbd.com/
